Package ca.ualberta.appfive

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BController
    Interface for controller classes
    BView<M>
    This is an interface all views need to have
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppController
    App Controller calls for methods of the AppFive model The methods includes getters and setters from various sub-models.
    AppFive
    This is the master model class for the books It includes methods for handling user profile and books.
    AppFiveApp
    The application class for the app.
    Bid
    This Bid class has bidder and bid rate
    BidsDisplayActivity
    This Activity has BidsListAdapter to get to view bidList
    BidsListAdapter
    This BidsList Adapter displays items from array list to view
    BidViewEntryHolder
    This class gets bidder text and rate text
    BModel<V extends BView>
    Model classes inherit from this class.
    Book
    Class for the book object.
    BookDisplayActivity
    This activity displays a book and all of it's data.
    BookListAdapter
    Strategy for displaying list items borrowed from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11281952/listview-with-customized-row-layout-android by Sajmon on 1 July 2012, accessed 29 January 2016
    BookViewEntryHolder
    This book view class gets title, genre, and status of a book
    BuildConfig  
    EditBookActivity
    This activity edits book and saves it.
    EditProfileActivity
    Activity for editing the user's profile.
    ESController
    ESController is used for communication to database
    ESController.AddBookTask
    For adding a book to database.
    ESController.AddUserTask
    For adding a user to the database.
    ESController.DeleteBookTask
    For deleting books from database by Boolean
    ESController.DeleteUserTask  
    ESController.EditBookTask
    For updating an edited book.
    ESController.EditUserTask
    For editing a user to database
    ESController.GetBooksBidsbyUserTask
    For getting books bidded by user from database
    ESController.GetBooksBorrowedbyUserTask
    For getting books borrowed by user from database
    ESController.GetBooksbyUserTask
    For getting books by user from database
    ESController.GetUserProfileTask
    Fetch user's profile data from the database.
    ESController.GetUserTask
    Fetch current user data from the database.
    ESController.IsUserInDatabaseTask
    For checking whether user is in database
    ESController.SearchTask
    For searching books from database
    FileParser
    This class saves and loads files with json objects
    HomeActivity
    This activity displays the home page of app
    LoginActivity
    This is the activity when the user logs in
    MyBiddedActivity
    This activity shows the books that the user has bidded on.
    MyBooksActivity
    My books activity shows the user's books in a list
    MyBorrowingActivity
    My Borrwing Activity gets a list of the books user borrowed.
    OwnerInfo
    A model for holding Owner info of books
    OwnerInfoActivity
    Activity for displays owner's information.
    R  
    R.anim  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.color  
    R.dimen  
    R.drawable  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.menu  
    R.mipmap  
    R.raw  
    R.string  
    R.style  
    R.styleable  
    RegisterActivity
    Activity for making a new user account.
    SearchActivity
    This activity allows user to search all existing books.
    UserProfile
    Singleton for User Profile information.
    UserProfileActivity
    Activity for displaying the user's data Includes an option to update the profile
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Book.Status
    enum for different status of the book
